CustomField.description: The record type name to use on the account record
CustomField.formula: CASE(RecordType.Name ,"Core Referral Source Record Type","Core Referral Source Record Type" ,"HRS Referral Source Record Type", "HRS Referral Source Record Type" ,"Paychex Internal Referral Account Record Type", "Paychex Internal Referral Account Record Type" ,"Sales Channel Referral Account Record Type", "Sales Channel Referral Account Record Type" ,"Sales Partner Referral Account Record Type", "Sales Partner Referral Account Record Type" ,"Referral Account Record Type")
CustomField.label: Ref Record Type Name
